name: Andrew Nuckols
text: Honest Mechanics that know their stuff. May not be the cheapest but you absolutely get what you pay for. Job is always done right the first time.

name: Tiffany Alexander
text: Great place to get your car fixed, or get a  performance modifications especially if you have a German or Asian car, they specialize in Porsche and BMW

name: Clint Fillingim
text: Awesome service! Was driving through the area and these guys went above and beyond to take care of me. Would highly recommend, they are very knowledgeable.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Clint. Glad to help

name: Alton Hill
text: Terrible experience they try to rip you off depending on what you know about parts I’ll rather take my Porsche to Porsche of Birmingham instead rip offs!!

resp.text: I do not have a record of ever doing business with you.

name: David O'shea WOODRUFF
text: Need your classic Porche repaired or restored? Then, look no further.

name: NIckSellsCars Bham
text: Took my 911 here a while back for some preventive maintenance (and some needed) and they took fantastic care of the car. They upgraded the IMS and a myriad of other known weak points in these cars, as well as gave it a new clutch. Top notch work in a laid back environment.

resp.text: Thank You! We appreciate your review

name: Jekyll H
text: Good job guys!

name: Jessica Rogers
text: Place is great. The guys are very friendly. Always a pleasure

name: Randy James
text: I purchased a 2006 Porsche Carrera S (997) earlier this year in Atlanta. I drove it to Birmingham to have Eurasian perform a pre-purchase inspection. They were very thorough and answered any and all questions I had for them. They put my mind at ease as to a couple of issues. I purchased the car and I have continued to use Eurasian for my service needs even though I live in Montgomery. All of the guys are excellent technicians and mechanics. I give them two thumbs up!

resp.text:
Thanks Randy !!
We really appreciate you business and look forward to seeing you in the future.
Casey

name: Bert Ellis
text: These guys are the best.   Austin, Casey, and Devin are competent, enthusiastic, honest, and friendly.    I highly recommend them for anything your Euro / Asian car wants or needs.

name: Ty Hottel
text: Knowledgeable people and reasonable pricing. Don't be put off by the non-descript appearance on the outside. It's like a Porsche toy store inside

name: Joseph Lathem
text: These guys have integrity, knowledge, and competent skill. I highly recommend them and look forward to using their services in the future.

name: Corey Crowe
text: Great work on my Porsche

name: Andre' Greenwood
text: Real advice you can trust and service second to none. Keep up the great work guys!

name: Frank Samuelson
text: Fantastic Porsche experts!  Extremely knowledgeable and professional.

resp.text: Thanks Frank! Much appreciated.

name: Euge
text:
I live in Wisconsin and found a car in Alabama I wanted to buy. A friend recommended Eurasian Auto to do the PPI so I gave them a call. I spoke with Devin, who also did the PPI. Devin was very helpful in explaining the PPI process and covering what they look for. Fast forward a couple days, and I got a call from Devin and he talked me through everything they had found with the car. After having them look over the car I'm flying down to buy it this weekend with no fears whatsoever.

If you need a PPI or need work done to your vehicle, I feel like this shop is honest and does thorough work.

name: Tiffany Alexander
text: Great, friendly,  professional, and they provide honest care of one of my prized possessions

name: Patricia Seymour
text: Love Gulf Coast Auto Group staff.  It’s the Audi that’s the problem.  I only have approximately 46K miles on the car.  She’s pretty.  But the convertible top has leaked since the purchase.  Then there have been so many problems with other parts, and a 3x AC problem/fix (qualifying it as a lemon), that it has been in the shop as much as it’s been with me.  I have a color-coded chart. When I let the “powers that be” at Audi know about the first few years of problems, they basically said, “FU with a smile”.  This car was actually built in Germany.  My German friends would be appalled.  They take their car quality very seriously.

name: Emily
text: I had a great experience purchasing my new car from Gulf Coast Auto Group. I highly recommend Mr. Kenny Cunningham. He was professional, honest, friendly, and made my buying experience easy and fast. All of the staff I spoke with were friendly and professional. I will use them in the future.

name: Ellie M
text: My service representative, Laura Collier, is wonderful! She always ensures that every issue is resolved. We have been extremely satisfied with the service that she and the mechanics at Audi of Mobile have provided to us over the past 5 years with our two Audis. My son took his Audi to another local repair shop and they caused damage to the vehicle because they lacked the knowledge and skills to properly perform the repairs. We then took his car to Audi of Mobile and they corrected everything! I will ONLY have my Audi Q5 serviced at Audi of Mobile.

name: Makenzie Brenner
text: I admit I was nervous to purchase a car online from a dealership over 6 hours away, but Gulf Coast Auto, specifically Devon made the experience seamless. Great communication, fantastic customer service and product knowledge. It was honestly the best experience I could’ve hoped for. 100% worth the road trip down and I am obsessed with my new car!

name: Queen Royalty
text: Everyone there is so nice and helpful. The finance department and the sales person (Alfredo Montes) made sure we understood the offer for our Volkswagen Atlas.

name: Myra C.
text: I went to Porsche of New Orleans and they were trying to blantantly make the 2018 Macan I wanted inaccessible. These fools really tried to make me put down 20,000 for a 500/month car payment. AVOID THAT DEALERSHIP AT ALL COST. They did not want to sell to a African American woman. Anyways, I found 2 more 2018 Macans in the Mobile area the same evening so we decided to go the next day. BEST DECISION EVER! I traded in my 2014 Infiniti Q60S that I loved dearly for a 2018 Porsche Macan! As a traveling CVOR tech, I needed more space and Kendarrius ensured that I didn’t leave without the vehicle that I wanted! I literally pulled up at 12:15 and was driving off at 4:30!! That was crazy fast, but if you are looking for an amazing deal on a beautiful car, THIS is the place to go. My monthly payment is 585/month on a PORSCHE!! That’s unheard of! They knew I wanted the car and this dealership made sure I left in it without having to eat bread and water for the next couple of years!

name: Monica Mingo
text:
My last two vehicles were Land Rovers.  I narrowed this purchase to an Audi or a Land Rover.  Devon took me on my test drives after donning a mask and I left with total knowledge of the Q5.  I went to the Land Rover dealership and was left knowing the same about their vehicles as I already knew upon arrival.  I was also unhappy with the attitude once I requested the salesman wear a mask during the test drive.

I called Devon the next morning to let him know that my husband and I would be returning and, when we got there, Devon was ready to go.  This young man has received several awards and accolades based on his performance and knowledge of Audi vehicles. I noticed two certifications on his desk.

Headed there my husband told me we were not going to buy the vehicle today and that this was simply an exploratory mission and that he wanted to test drive and then get the information in order to make a thoughtful decision.  After speaking with Devon at length, we ended up buying the Q5 same day.

Devon simply makes you feel good.  You sense his honesty right up front and there were no questions he couldn't answer.  We truly felt we were in extremely competant hands.

Thank you to Devon, the auto group, and for making it easy to jump the Land Rover ship and become a member of the Audi family.

name: Keri Van Atta
text: Alfredo Montes was very helpful and nice. We ended up not being able to afford the car we wanted, but he never made us feel bad or embarrassed. And most importantly he didn't make us feel like we wasted his time. He went above and beyond for us and I really appreciate it! Thanks Alfredo!!😊😊😊

name: Lee Lee
text: Courtney was so accommodating & super nice. Thanks Courtney- appreciate!

name: Daniel Flores
text: Purchased a VW all over the phone with Doug Klezmer. Doug took great care of me with a very smooth and convenient purchase. Very happy all the way around. Wish all car purchases were this easy! Thanks, Doug!

name: Michele
text: Me and my husband have had so many bad experiences here before the name change and new management or whatever. We always made appointments and would be there for 3 or 4 hours, we hated going there and the customer service was horrible! Today was the first time we've been there in at least a year or more and we were amazed at how much more better it is now. Our appointment was at 1 and we were out in less than an hour. Sean took great care of us and kept updated about what was going on with our car! The customer service was AMAZING! We have never experienced such great service like we did today. Thank you so much Laura and Sean and everyone for such a great experience and service we received today from you all!

name: Wayne Douglas
text: This dealership is very deceptive and dishonest. My salesperson was Alfredo. I specifically asked them to run my credit only through VW and stated that on the credit application. I found out a few days later that they had run it through all 3 credit bureaus instead and when I confronted Alfredo about it he said that that is just the way they do business and that my credit won't be hurt if I buy a car from them. My credit score dropped 24 points because of their unethical sales tactics. Most car manufacturers have their on inhouse financial arm so when you run your credit directly through them you only take an 8 point hit so that's why I made the specific request. Because I value my credit score so much it is very high and now I am reluctant to have it run at another dealership to get the car I want because of Alfredo and his companies dishonesty. This is just the worst fo many misleading statements Alfredo made to me. You're better off driving to one of the surrounding cities to buy your next vehicle than from here.

name: Krista Blanton-Goguen
text:
We recently bought our first Volvo. AJ has gone out of his way to make this experience as seamless as possible. His knowledge about the car far surpasses any other dealership we have worked with.
The vehicle is amazing and capable of so many things.  Each time the technology out smarts me he is always available to answer my text or phone call and walk me through it.
I just appreciate the extra effort he always goes to to make us feel valuable. I love my Volvo and don’t plan on going anywhere else for my future vehicles.

name: Robert Sanders
text: Had a wonderful experience from my first contact to walking out the door. Zach was great and took care of my wife and I. Recommended this place to everyone since buying a car and will go back for our next vehicle.

name: Patrick Isbell
text: My wife recently purchased a used 16 Beatle convertible that was a recent lease turn in. Devon was an awesome salesman and made us feel like family during the entire experience. I believe we got a quality vehicle and a reasonable price. I know she will be thinking of her buying experience and the welcoming employees whenever she drops the top this summer!

name: Edward Thomas
text: Gulf Coast Auto Group should change their name again, because of one simple question- do you give military discounts? No one in the service department knew or was unwilling to give at least 10% off. The parts department gave 10% off for military when I purchased 4 spark plug not less than 15 minutes laters. Military service people active and retired I will inform you don't buy anything from there without a discount 10% or higher, & at this point it should be higher.

name: june newton
text:
THIS THE PLACE!!
Considering a new car, this is the place! My husband and I bought 12 cars in our lifetime - this experience was by far the most professional/personable buying experience. The consultant, Santwan, was knowledgeable beyond measure, unlike the run-of-the-mil hunting salesman. The entire experience, from consultant, to floor manager [John], to Finance [Danny], to the GM [Mark].  Wow, treatment like the customer is a REAL PERSON not just a customer buying one of their cars - really, they have hearts and personality? We couldn't believe the care and the detail in service.  You go Gulf Coast Auto Group!!

resp.text:
Hi Ms. Newton, thank you so much for the kind words! We are thrilled that Santwan, John, Danny and Marc are an integral part of our team. We are so humbled that you chose Gulf Coast Auto Group!

Ashley Allen
Business Development Director

name: Elizabeth Millette
text: I recommmed this dealership to anyone. They made the car buying process easy! We first contacted Melissa from their online sales department. She was always quick to respond and answer our questions about a specific car, but never pushy or bothersome. When we were ready, she set us up an appointment to come in to the dealership. From that point we worked with Brittany Smith! She was a pleasure to do business with. Brittany was very friendly, knowledgeable and never made us feel rushed or pressured. We couldn’t be happier with our new car and the service we received at Gulf Coast Auto Group.

resp.text:
Hi Elizabeth, we are so happy you’re loving your new vehicle! Brittany and Melissa are key members to our sales team, and we are lucky to have them! I’ll pass your kind words on to them and our management staff Monday morning! Thanks again for giving us the opportunity to earn your business and we look forward to serving you!

Ashley D. Allen
Business Development Director

name: Chris Mayfield
text: These guys were amazing. They knew I wanted the car, and got the price and interest down to what I could afford. I would highly recommend this dealer.

resp.text: Thank you Chris! We appreciate your business and congrats on your new car!

name: Christian
text: I had an awesome experience with Gulf Coast Auto Group, after 7 months of searching for the right car and having poor experiences with other dealers across the nation as I live in Colorado, I was thrilled with my experience here. Santwan Wiley is the MAN. If you guys are looking for an excellent client advisor who will do everything in your best interest in helping you get into an awesome vehicle, he is your guy. I appreciate all the effort the team put in and his effort in to making sure that car was mine. I did not feel pressured at all and this was by the far the bestcar buying experience that I have had. I Cannot wait to get down there and take receipt of my new 2015 BMW X5! Thanks guys for an awesome experience!!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Christian.

name: Carly Martinez
text: thanks to mr devon for helping me buy my first car!

name: Becky Dunn
text: The is the best car dealer i have ever dealt with and mr. Paul Stanley is the best to deal with!! He will treat you right i love my Volkswagen !!!

name: Anthony Cook
text:
I leased a 2018 Volkswagen Jetta from this dealership on June the 27th. It is now August  6th and I have yet to get my tag paperwork. I had to call the bank to get my old car loan extended so my old car loan would not go in collections. Not only that shortly after I leased I noticed a small ding on my hood. I went to the dealership to see what they could do and they said it would be no problem to fix. It has now been over a month I haven't received a call or a text. I know the dealership has recently changed owners, but the management at this establishment really dropped the ball. My family will no longer purchase or lease any vehicles from this dealership.

I did try to call you. I left a message and no response. Why would I have expected anything different.

resp.text: Anthony- I sincerely apologize for this inconvenience. We expect exceptional customer service, and we regret that we missed that mark. My name is Ashley Allen and I am the Business Development Director here at Gulf Coast Auto Group. Please call me directly at 251.301.0013 so we can get you what you need asap.

name: Michael Kolbe
text: Thanks Devon! Great experience and a perfect vehicle!

name: Lisa Wurst
text: Stated that they did not have to follow through with what was written on my leasing contract “Since Dean sold it to us.”

name: William Deacon
text: I was on a road trip 650 miles from my local dealership, when the vehicle developed a problem. Turns out the wheel speed sensors where the issue. I call my dealer who advised me to find a dealership that could make the repair... easier said than done. I was told 10-14 days before the service could be performed... until I spoke to Shannon Stull at Century Auto. I briefly defined the situation in hope that the parts and time might be available. In record time Shannon with the cooperation Chris Pope, where able to order overnight the proper parts and squeeze the car in for service. The parts did arrive and the service was performed without issue. I’m sure it was a team effort to make this happen, and thanks to the professionals who actually installed the parts! Clearly this Dealership, Century Auto has the service and professional staff to get the the job done. My night mare hunting trip was saved by the team, to include transportation to and from the rental car. Everyone I met at the dealership was outstanding, but I can’t say enough about Shannon and Chris.. true professionals. THANK YOU, for all the efforts and the time you saved me!

resp.text: William, thank you for sharing your experience and I am glad the team was able to help.

name: Necedah Townsend
text: My Porsche was at the Huntsville shop for over an week after I told and showed the parts guy and manger Shannon what was wrong with my Porsche.  We pulled up the part and I left under the impression that the part was being ordered because it was going to take at least two days to arrive. Therefore when the part was scheduled to arrive was the timing I was told my car would be looked at by the technician. Lies lies lies .... I had to keep calling Shannon the manager to find out if there was any information on the arrival of the part ... how much will it cost and never an direct answer. Every time  it was let me call you back and I am about to go follow up. And never return the call/s. After my car was there for a week I called again to only find out the part was not ordered and they were ordering it that day. Which meant at least another two days waiting for the one part that we knew I needed to arrive. The sad thing is this is the only place locally that are certified to work on my car or get parts from. I had to get a rental twice for a week because I never knew when my car would be ready. Extremely Poor Customer Service. Lastly they called me at 4:00 to tell me my car was ready when they close at 5:00 with only an estimate for cost. Never stating that they did not except certain payments. Noted on my receipt I had a premium car wash lol.  My car was so dirty on the outside. I had just gotten the inside detailed myself. Such a joke.

resp.text: We are so sorry about the miscommunication regarding our service scheduling. While we can accommodate walk in clients, our customers who book appointments are priority to have their vehicles serviced. We take pride in our service departments commitment to thorough inspections and quality work, and sometimes both of those take some time. Our team worked as quickly and as diligently as they could to try meet your expectations. We apologize your vehicle was not diagnosed and repaired as quickly as you wanted.

name: Chris Haury
text: Professional, as expected from Porsche. Even though they were backed up and hampered by an employee out sick and weren't able to provide the loaner vehicle requested, they honored my appointment and provided an excellent door to door shuttle service that was really efficient and quick. When they phoned to tell me my service was complete, the driver was already 10 min from my house. The service on my vehicle was excellent as expected, and the Porsche tech sent a video going over my vehicle and the work done. Very happy.

resp.text: Thank you for your five star review! We are happy to see you received exceptional care from our team.

name: matthewsleila
text: I have had issues with my Macan, too many in my opinion,  however this team of mechanics and the service team are the reason why I stick with it and remain patient and positive. They truly care and always have done their very best to ensure,  although there have been issues, that they provide the best service possible and always go out of their way to please the customer. Amazing team, technical knowledge and certainly understand and practice high quality customer service. Shout out to Jacob,  Randy and Chris. I appreciate you guys.

resp.text: Thank you Leila, the guys will continue to strive to provide the service that you appreciate and deserve.

name: Bill Brown
text: Great experience for a long time coming first buyer. Total professionalism from all Century employees. No pressure and all were extremely helpful in explaining the new world of Porsche, to include those not directly involved in the sale.  Highly recommend Century and the Porsche Brand.

resp.text: Welcome to the Porsche family and Porsche of Huntsville, a Century Automotive dealership. Congratulations on your purchase and thanks again for your business.

name: raymond fernandez
text:
About over a year or so ago Porshe of Huntsville did inspection service on my Cayenne without informing me of the cost. When I called this out to the service manager he said he would make it right and explained the dealership would provide the next service at no cost to me. He said he would document it in their computer records. I counted on that all this time, so when my vehicle was brought in for service I fully expected them to honor that promise. We'll there service manager said they could not find any record. Please note that I confirmed this way back with the previous service manager that it was noted on their record.
I am completely dissatisfied with the lack of commitment to what was promised by the dealership.
I therefore  refused any additional service and just agreed to pay for an oil change (which costs $430), The car was kept for 4 hours.
I will never buy a Porshe again.

resp.text: We wanted to follow up and and thank you for speaking to our service manager Shannon about your experience and hope the resolution  you came to together was satisfactory.

name: Dave Vaupel
text: I flew to Huntsville from Jacksonville to buy a Cayenne e-hybrid and drive it back home. From my pickup from the airport to drive-off it was a great experience.  Bradley D. and Jon C. Took great care of me. I will definitely be talking to them when it’s time for the 2 seater. Thank you Porsche of Huntsville!

resp.text: Thank you for your five star review! We are happy to see your trip was well worth it and that you love your new Cayenne!

name: Ronnie Honbuckle
text:
Exceptional Service staff from the service managers desk, shop mechanics, parts department, shuttle service personnel, the folks who cleaned and washed my Porsche and bookkeeping departments. Thanks for the courteous, timely and a job well done. Cheers
R. Hornbuckle 4/16/'21

resp.text: Thank you for your five star review! We are happy to see you received exceptional care from our team.

name: Mike Kurbanick
text: What a great experience!  Everyone was friendly and knowledgeable.  Our car was exactly what we were told it would be and then some.

resp.text: Thank you for putting your trust in us and flying up to Huntsville. I hope you had a safe and enjoyable drive back to Florida.

name: Todd Lackey
text: Century and the team at century Porsche are always top notch. Above and beyond the call of duty is always my experience. Jacob and Chris make it easy. A+ service. Good job!

resp.text: Thank you Todd

name: Kelley Snook
text: Exceeded expectations. I purchased my car sight unseen and had it shipped to Michigan. Bradley walked me through the entire process including what to expect and timing of each step. He is a knowledgeable professional that I would make an effort to work with again—even though there are three Porsche dealerships within 25 miles of me. Everything was exactly as he said it would be and he continues to be a willing resource for me after the purchase. Outstanding communication. Thank you!

resp.text:
Kelley, Thank you for the kind review. Purchasing a vehicle sight unseen from several states away can be a difficult. We try very hard to represent our vehicles to long distance customers as if they were looking at them person, yours was easy. Thank you for your business and entrusting us with your purchase.

Drive safely.

Porsche of Huntsville

name: Ken Boustani
text: As always,great service.My Porsche is ready now.

resp.text: Thank you for your five star rating! We appreciate your business!

name: Len Nelson
text: Per usual, Century Porsche and my mechanic  Graham Boccino are the best. Top shelf service for your Porsche at reasonable rates. He installed the PSE exhaust on my Carrera S and it sounds incredible.

name: Justin Manzanares
text: Ray Diaz is the best. Kept me informed the whole way through the build.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and your continued business. You spec'd out a beautiful Spyder, enjoy it!

name: Roy Duvall
text: Great experience and communication throughout the process.

resp.text: Roy, thanks for taking the time to share your experience.

name: Joseph Owens
text: The service department is absolutely amazing. I have never experienced the level of care and detail that they provide..  Randy and Jacob are the nicest and most professional people I have dealt with.  I cannot say enough good things about them.  I will let them service my cayman every time i need something done.  By the way having the videos sent to me while it was being serviced was amazing.  Thank you very much for your help..

name: Clint Cosper
text: Service was great, car was complete at time stated. Thanks

name: David McKenzie
text: Knowledgeable techs, convenient location, will use again.

resp.text: Looking forward to seeing you next time David

name: Mel g (missy)
text: We traveled from Florida to pick up our 2018 Porsche Cayenne sight unseen and was exactly as Bradley told us. Great working with Bradley. Would not hesitate purchasing again from this dealer.

name: C Wells
text: I highly recommend the service department at Porsche of Huntsville. Randy Carter and Jacob Holt consistently provide a great experience and high quality. The service work is always done correctly and the pricing has been very competitive to the market. This dealership is a valuable asset for the local community!

name: Felecia Hives
text: Tried to charge up my car, only for their vehicles

name: Minibike King
text: Love this place but I always leave without a car. Maybe after my next stimulus check fingers crossed.

name: Jacqueline Wade
text: I have used this dealership’s service department twice. Not only are the service folks knowledgeable and seem trusting, I’m so happy that each  and every person are very professional with a commitment to customer service. Quite a class act.  Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you Jacqueline for the kind words. Porsche of Huntsville strives for this kind of service and relationships with all of our customers.

name: Becky Cobb
text:
I live halfway between Huntsville and Memphis. I took my car to Memphis for its annual service a year ago. My check engine light had popped up several times before I took it.   I was told there was nothing they could do for my car’s issue unless my check engine light was “on”.  The issue persisted and became worse.  I decided to try Huntsville to see if they could help.  To my surprise, your dealership exceeded my expectations!  I was provided with a loaner car and constant updates.  Your service manager, Randy Carter, was amazing. After my disappointing experience in Memphis, Randy and Chris Pope will be my “go to guys” for as long as I drive my Cayenne.  This car was our first Porsche purchase and being cared for the way I was in Huntsville, it will not be my last.
Thank you for everything you did. I am a satisfied customer and will continue to use  you for my future purchases.
Sincerely, Becky Cobb, Iuka Ms,

name: Charles Phillips
text: I had a major service performed on my Panamera this week.  Jacob and Randy provided excellent service. From the time I dropped the car off to getting the loaner car to pick up.   Everything went smoothly. Communication was very good.  Definitely recommend this service team.

name: J Williams
text:
I’m am glad others have had a good experience with this dealer. We have not. We found the car we wanted here in Huntsville while shopping from out of state. Initially the process was smooth, easy, friendly...until the salesman, Bradley, sold the car out from under us. This was after several attempts to call, email, and yet for 24 hrs no word back, nothing. Only to receive a call hours after all the attempts to reach...to say the car was sold. Having dealt with other dealers and more specifically, Porsche dealers...the lack of communication and poor salesmanship was absolutely horrible.

I know, in our case, we can shop at other dealers...I can only hope they treat their customers better than they did us.

resp.text:
J Williams,
I am sorry that you had a bad experience. Feel free to call me if you would like to discuss.
Jon Cunha, Sales Manager

name: shane Gadomski
text: Beautiful and luxurious and sporty all in one! Jacob in service is very knowledgable, helpful, and professional. Great overall experience!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Shane

name: Maria Ivette Rivera-Del Valle Anaya
text: Excellent service!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your five star review! We are happy to see you received exceptional care from our team.

name: Carl Weimer
text: Randy does a pretty great job in service. I bought a 2017 Macan S, had a few issues, but they were resolved quickly and got me back on the road.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Carl. We are proud to have Randy and his service team.

name: Richard Schwartz
text:
I love love ❤️ my new Porsche.
Yeah yeah YEAH!

name: Robert Nelson
text: We have another dealership closer but we make the drive to this location because of the excellent service department. If you want to feel like your business is appreciated go here.

name: HC Kwok
text: I bought a pre-owned 911, and have been coming to Century for service.  I track and abuse my car...and I'm kind of picky about the work done.  Randy and his team have been outstanding in dealing with my numerous requests and getting my 911 ready for every weekend when I need it to perform at Barber Motorsports Park.

name: Keith Jackson
text: Randy Carter and the maintenance team are great.  The sales lobby is nice, too.

name: Vytautas Pukis
text: Helpful knowledgable staff. Highly recommended!!

name: Steven Payne
text: Super service!

name: Matt Tucker
text: Excellent experience

name: Ken Williams
text:
Jonathan did a great job of keeping me up to date on the process of getting some warranty work done on my 911.  Although they were short handed, they completed the work in a reasonable time once they got the nod from corporate to proceed.
KW

resp.text:
Thanks so much for the review, Ken Williams! We truly appreciate you.
Jack Ingram Motors, Inc.

name: Thomas Lyles
text:
Wonderful experience with this car purchase.  Richard Conniff is so brand savvy and personable. Usually, I know as much or more about the product than the salesperson I’m dealing with.  Not in this case.  Plus, we never felt rushed or unappreciated.

This vehicle was the most expensive we’ve ever purchased.  However, our interaction with this dealership was such that we’ve never enjoyed it more.

Thank you Richard and Jack Ingram Porsche!

resp.text:
Thanks so much for the review, Thomas Lyles! We truly appreciate you.
Jack Ingram Motors, Inc.

name: Erik Westerlund
text: I had a complicated repair service need and the service team at Jack Ingram Porsche in Montgomery went to remarkable lengths to make sure that every element of the experience went as smoothly as possible.  They provided concierge-level personalized service and earnest attention to detail that exceeded even the usual high-standard that defines Porsche.  Sincere thanks to Rhiannon Coley and the entire team of service professionals that she so well represents at Jack Ingram.  Excellent in all respects.

name: Denise Dukes
text:
Great Porsche and great experience at Jack Ingram Porsche.  Richard was always polite,  knowledgeable,  and very helpful.
10 out of 10 for my Porsche adventure. And definitely 5 stars.

name: Karen Bell
text: The customer service displayed at Jack Ingram Porsche was outstanding. Please keep up the good work.

resp.text:
Thanks so much for the review, Karen Bell! We truly appreciate you.
Jack Ingram Motors, Inc.

name: charles tatom

name: Ken Biddulph
text: I took my 2002 Boxster here to have a check-engine light diagnosed, after having the light looked at by my local European Motors mechanic. My local mechanic changed out the catalytic converter, but the light came back on (was not a Porsche cat). He next put the old cat back on, refunded me the money, and tested and changed the oxygen sensors. Still, the light came back on after driving it about 50 miles. He suggested I go to a Porsche dealer. (In hindsight, I wish we would have left the other cat on that he put on in the first place, but we were troubleshooting, and this stuff is expensive anyway.) I took it to Jack Ingram Porsche. They put on a Porsche cat (still expensive, paying for the Porsche name) but I’ve gone over 100 miles now without the light coming back on. The original code was for a bank 2 catalytic converter. Before this, I only went 30 to 50 miles before the CEL light came back on. So, I have hope that the Porsche cat fixed the problem, along with the new oxygen sensors (which the old ones were visibly defective). The dealership worked with me pretty well, as I live an hour and a half away. I dropped it off on a Sunday.  It stayed the week until they could get the parts. It then took me a couple days before I could come get the car. The only thing I could say as far as improving service was that sometimes they were busy and it took a while before they would call me back. However, the other staff relayed messages and helped arrange for me to pick it up after the service department was closed, because that’s when I could make it to the dealership.  In the end, it worked out. If the problem is fixed, I’m happy. I’d go there again.

name: Steven Mccornack
text:
This has been THE most positive experience I've EVER had with a Porsche dealership.  I had my 1985 911 Targa shipped out to Birmingham from Oregon this past May.  The car has been in my family since new - purchased in January 1986 - and is all-original.  But it had been in storage at my folks' place for several years.  Not only did the folks at Birmingham Porsche help me coordinate shipping delivery straight to their service department, but they immediately got the car in and did a full PPI on it, and produced a detailed report of everything that needs to be done.  Throughout the process, they gave me multiple different recommended options, and were consistently friendly, courteous, and kind.  For instance, the engine is due for a rebuild.  But I just can't financially swing it right now.  Instead of ANY hint of judgment or pushiness, they were completely understanding, and were like, "Don't worry AT ALL - just bring it back in when you're ready!"  :-)  In particular, Rodney and Tracy went out of their way to take phenomenal care of me and my car - treating me throughout as if I was a millionaire owner of a new 918 rather than a UAB Professor with an old 911.  I cannot begin to tell you how much it means to me to have guys who truly LOVE these cars - and are dedicated to taking meticulous care of them - right here in town.  They will be the ONLY ones who handle my "baby" from now on.  You can trust your beloved Porsches to them as well!

REVIEW #2:  For some jank reason, Google won't allow you to post MULTIPLE reviews, even if you have multiple EXPERIENCES to share, so I'm doing it this way.  I was driving my 911 around town, and started feeling my right heel slip on my floormat.  If you're an old-school Porsche owner, you immediately know that this can only mean ONE thing: master brake cylinder.  :-(   Sure enough, got home, put my hand on the mat, and it came up shiny and wet.  SAD FACE.  Immediately took it to Porsche Birmingham.  Figured they wouldn't be able to get to it for days, but instead they had it checked out within 24 hours, even though I (obviously) hadn't created an appointment in advance.  Two days later a new master cylinder had been installed.  When I picked up my baby, I was STUNNED to see that the floormat had been STEAM-CLEANED - along with the PASSENGER one as well.  They even DRIED them, prior to my pickup!  It's the little things, people, that speak to quality in service.  When asked about it, both Rodney and Tracy were like, "We didn't want your mats to be soiled!"  Exactly: thoughtful, considerate, and meticulous.  A++ Folks.

I never felt any pressure to buy or make any unnecessary changes.  He was always available by phone or email.  He made very helpful suggestions when it came to the purchase. name: brad young
text: Had a great experience with this dealer. Michael Freeman was our rep and always took my call and gave us quick answers to questions we needed to make the decision to buy our 2020 Macan.  When we came to pick up the car Had been detailed and looked amazing.

resp.text: Hi Brad Young, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at Porsche Birmingham. We're happy we could meet your expectations! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

name: Ronda Parsons
text: We are so impressed with the service department at Porsche Birmingham! They went above and beyond to figure out the issue with our car and fix it!! We'll definitely buy from them again!! 5 stars!!!!

resp.text: Ronda Parsons, we're glad you had such a wonderful experience with us! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

name: Scarlett Canedy
text: My husband and I bought a 2017 Camry XLE from Chuck Gardner! He went above and beyond in making car buying a pleasant experience! My husband called Chuck about the Camry and Chuck went and got the car! He took multiple pictures and sent them to us! When we got to the dealership Chuck had everything ready! We drove the car and signed the paper! Truly the easiest car buying experience ever!

name: kwayne jones
text: I saw the listing on Thursday, touched bases that day, talked to Greg who gave me the rundown. Michael Freeman called me back later that day, I asked him if the car had certain things, he took the time to walk out to the car & check everything I asked, I told him I was coming from MS to Birmingham on Saturday. He was waiting when I got there, the customer service was exemplary, cudos guys well done. I was headed back to MS in my new car within an hour. Very pleased!!

resp.text: Kwayne Jones, we're glad you had such a wonderful experience with us! Our team strives to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out!

name: D C
text: Terrible Customer Service, Poor follow up,They are a buy now or We dont care dealership.I was so shocked.It was better under other management. I purchased my vehicle from Mercedes. I promise you people that I am not lying ! Go to Mercedes over 459 or Anywhere for better Customer Service....This is a Real review; Not an emotional or angry review...

name: A. Corbett
text: I have purchased 3 vehicles from Porsche Birmingham and every experience has been super! Friendly staff, wonderful service department, always been greatly taken care of! Chuck and Tracy have always been very nice and helpful!

name: S G
text: Great service...very friendly and professional! You can always count on Chuck to go the extra mile!

resp.text: S G, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! Our team strives to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out!

name: Drew Ramsey
text:
My scheduled maintenance visit was outstanding! From the time I arrived to the time I left Cesar was very approachable and interested in the concerns I had with my Porsche. All of my issues and concerns were addressed under the CPO and while my car was in the shop for a week I was provided with a new 992 as a loaner vehicle! When I picked up my vehicle it had been washed and vacuumed and all issues were resolved to my complete satisfaction .

Thank you Cesar! Best experience yet!

name: kristina carr
text: Satisfied with my purchase

name: Ben Noe (MisterBen)
text: Amazing experience! A+, super easy process. Sam and the salesmen are wonderful. Completely transparent process, very easy to do business with. Even with all the construction going on, it was never an issue. Speaks volumes for the management and staff at the store. Would recommend.

name: Joan Krawcheck
text: Fabulous service !

resp.text: Hi Joan Krawcheck, we are very happy to have provided you with such a positive experience! We hope to be of service to you again in the future. Best wishes, Porsche Birmingham

name: Aubrey Smith
text: Steve and Sam were extremely helpful in helping my husband and I purchase our vehicle. We are first time car buyers and they were very thorough in explaining things to us and helping us to understand the car buying process. We are in love with our (new to us) Ford Explorer. I highly recommend them if you are looking for a new or used vehicle.

name: V K (Vestelle)
text: I have been a customer of Porsche of Birmingham for many years. Steve Huett has always been the Brand Ambassador helping me with my purchases and any questions or assistance I have needed. He is very kind and cares about his customers and their satisfaction. He has always been very honest and straightforward. We have our cars serviced there and have received excellent service. The entire team is great but Tracey Hebert is the the service advisor that usually takes care of us and does so very professionally. Can’t say enough good things about this dealership and Steve and Tracey and the entire team. Love my car and how well they take care of it!

name: Matthew Blevins
text: Excellent experience at this Porsche dealership. Everyone was very helpful and friendly and worked with us on everything that we asked for. I especially want to point out Porsche Salesman Josiah for being extremely helpful, friendly, and having an extensive knowledge about everything Porsche. It is a rare thing these days to find a salesperson who is passionate for what they do and Josiah definitely has it. Sam was also a great help and met all of our terms to make the deal happen. Overall A++ experience!

name: Charles Vacarella
text: Porsche of Birmingham is an excellent dealership.  The staff is friendly and very professional of the cars they represent and how they handle you from the you arrive to the time you leave. I have purchased of 20 cars from the dealership in the last 15 years. A Great Parts Department, Great Service Center and a wonderful showroom staff. The Staff of Sam, Lee , Katie and involved are excellent.  I reccommend this dealership to anyone who wants to be treated the right way.  No Pressure just very knowledgeable about their cars.

name: Matt Panepento
text: I have purchased numerous vehicles from Porsche of Birmingham and could not have had a better experience. From the time I walked in the door to the time I drive off the lot I felt like I was dealing with family. My every request and question was met with care, understanding, and a sense of urgency. I would recommend the dealership to anyone in the market. From the managers, sales professionals, and service department they are top notch from top to bottom!

name: Harper McGee
text:
Awesome service department!
Thank you so much Mr Rodney and crew for always taking good care of me.

name: Kepp Thorn
text: Excellent buying experience...Chuck was amazing!  Highly recommended!

name: Haul Videos
text:
Mike Freeman was my salesman and he did a wonderful job assisting me and my son.
He was very helpful and knowledgeable on the vehicle and spent time going over the details of the car with my son.   The lady in the accounting and purchasing dept was very friendly and helpful also.  And all this was after closing I might add!
Thanks again for a great experience!
This was my third car that I have purchased here!

name: Jerry Blevins
text:
Bought a 2019 Porsche 911 Carrera GTS this weekend. Our salesman was Josiah. He was very knowledgeable about the car, helpful, polite, and professional. Sam spent the time and effort to negotiate the deal with us and was also very polite and professional. In short, we had an excellent experience at the dealership and love the car! I would highly recommend both Sam and the dealership if you are in the market for a Porsche.

UPDATE: I changed my original 5-star rating to 1. I was told when I purchased the car by Sam (a manager at the dealership) that the Porsche would lose very little value over time. I returned to the dealership after having the car for about two (2) months and inquired as to the value of the automobile as I was thinking about getting rid of it because it seemed to be aggravating a prior back injury. I was offered almost $40,000 less than what I paid for the vehicle about 2 months earlier. I do not like being misled. If you purchase a vehicle from this dealership, I would not rely on anything they tell you. .

name: adam stacks
text: Great service and great people. Finance department was great to deal with and so easy. Thanks Katie!!!

name: John Thompson
text: Very professional sales staff. Beautiful dealership. On point. Would purchase again from them. This dealership is much better then the Land Rover-Jaguar dealership right across the street.

name: David H
text:
I was very satisfied with the service I received from Porsche Birmingham. I had a short shifter installed on my 2008 Carrera.
Tracy (Service Advisor) handled everything in a very professional manner.
The facilities are first rate. I waited for the work to be done, and it was completed in the time promised.
Thank you for a job well done....

name: Jess Lewis
text: I just bought a GTI from here and the people were absolutely wonderful. Huge shout-out to Josiah Posey for helping me out! Definitely would recommend seeing him if you're in the market for a new car

name: Mike Urioste
text:
I had a terrific experience with the service department. Rodney and Tracy were very professional and a pleasure to work with. I’m glad my 911 has good home to go to for quality service.
Thanks fellas!
Mike

name: Cheryl Herritt
text:
Tracey is fantastic!!! His explanation of the service to do is exceptional.  He knows the cars, their issues and the car service is done in a timely basis IF parts are there.  Which is not his fault.  Tracey and I are friends as well as my guy for professional service👍🏻👍🏻🎄
Sherry Herritt

name: Rob Rukstalis
text: Five stars! These guys pick you up at home when your car is ready and then if it's gonna be more than a few hours or a few days they give you a Porsche loaner !   Prices are no higher than at your local shop and it's the Porsche dealer so they stand behind their work perfectly.  When you call them you don't have to talk to you an operator,  it goes right to Robin or Tracy and either one of those guys will make the experience great.

name: Kari Craft
text: I had a fantastic experience with Porsche Birmingham.  They went above and beyond my expectations making the trade-in and purchasing part unbelievably easy for me! When other dealers wanted me to come in to the dealerships and talk (which I really didn't want to do...I knew what I wanted and that was that...) they allowed me to do the transaction over the phone and delivered my car to my front door! They gave me the best trade-in price out of all the dealerships that I had contacted (6 total) and the best price on my new Porsche! Thank you again for making the process fun, enjoyable and easy! I will be back for sure!

name: philip james
text: Got my water pump replaced on my Volkswagen. Mechanics name was William he was very friendly and very helpful and quick. I would recommend him and this dealership to anyone with a German car or someone who wants their vehicles taken care of

name: Lane Parsons
text:
Purchasing our Cayenne from Porsche Birmingham was an awesome experience.  We were somewhat intimidated going to a Porsche dealership in the first place, but everyone was very nice, very professional, and made us feel right at home.  In addition, our purchase was very smooth, very fast actually, and extremely simple.  Thank you everyone at Porsche Birmingham, and you definitely have customers for life (well worth our 2 hour drive).

Lane Parsons

name: Lori McCord
text: Excellent service department

name: Kenneth Thompson
text: Great buying experience. Michael Freeman went the extra mile to get the deal done, including driving down to Tuscaloosa to pick me up so I could take delivery of my Porsche.  It was as easy of a buying experience as I've ever had.

name: Lisa Garrison
text: This was a seamless, no stress experience.  Everyone I came into contact with was very professional and respectful. I love the Rav4 that I purchased.  I will absolutely do business again with Porsche Birmingham!

name: Cj Young
text: Good customer service we've ever been , interms of Porsche product

name: Christy Harding
text: Awesome experience

resp.text: Hi Christy Harding, we are very happy to have provided you with such a positive experience! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: William Gullung
text: I highly recommend Tracy Hebert and the Porsche team on Tom Williams Way.  I brought my 911 in with a fault message on my dash and they correctly diagnosed the problem and corrected it for a small fee the same afternoon with little wait time.  ( I got to test drive a Cayenne while i waited.)  Notable, is that I was seeking another opinion after being told by another dealer in another town that it would cost about $3000 to repair.  Hats off to you Tracy!

name: Lindsay Masson
text: I had been looking around at buying a new luxury SUV. I had the pleasure of working with Lily Young and Steve Colter. I cannot say enough about how wonderful they have been to work with! Lily made this an extremely easy, enjoyable and stress free experience for me! She was in constant communication, very knowledgeable and a complete pleasure to work with. This has by far been the best experience I have had buying a car. I would, without a doubt recommend this dealership!

name: Bryant Gilmer
text: A little snooty. Was there for a wheel lock key that they kept  on my customers last visit. Service guy Tracy was VERY accomodating.

name: ej7447
text: This first trip was to repair the A/C unit, which was done and all is well. Also had and oil/filter change and replaced fluid in brake lines. I asked about changing the coolant and the mechanic thought it was find but car was returned today after running hotter than normal. The Service Department is on this now and have a great attitude about insuring the vehicle is running as it should. Great car and very nice people to deal with.

name: Tyrone Henderson
text: My visit and service received at your Porsche dealership have been both refreshing and pleasant. The service  personnel have been professional and helpful in every way. I appreciate the way I have been valued as a customer.

name: Kee Tan
text: I have bought several vehicles from Tom Williams, by far this was the best experience I have had!  My sales specialist, Micheal Freeman, was very knowledgeable about the vehicle I was interested in and made the whole test driving/ purchasing/ delivery processes easy and fun!!  Thanks Michael!!!

name: B K
text: Had a very positive experience purchasing a car from 4 states away. Chuck and Bart were extremely responsive, attentive, and patient with all of my questions and requests. Outstanding sales department!

name: R VZ
text: The people in the service department could not have been more pleasant. Everything was done just as they said. I am very pleased.

name: tcape100
text: Steve was very thorough and responsive on the phone. The service at the dealership exceeded expectations. The entire process was painless and very professional. The only little glitch was the detail shop not doing a good job the first time but they detailed the car much better the second time. My buying experience from Porsche Birmingham was excellent and I would buy from them again and reccommend everyone to check them out before buying a Porsche.

name: Bill Kelley
text: I had Porsche Birmingham install a factory performance upgrade and do an alignment on my Cayman. They did a great job, perfect alignment, car was clean when I picked it up. Will definitely use them for my next regular maintenance.

name: jim hunter, jr.
text: I think Porsche of Birmingham is the best Porsche dealership that i have been to. I went to Montgomery AL. Atlanta and Florida to look at the Porsche Macan.Birmingham was for the best.Salesmen Steve Hewlett was the best.I was walking looking around to get some floor mats and other items and some one came out of the shop and ask me did i need some help.I SAID THIS GUY IS GOING TO WORK ON MY CAR ! The dealership was clean and the service department.I GIVE IT FIVE STARS!!!!!

name: Steven Schullo
text: Generally pleased with the used car purchase process at the dealership.  The sales associate and financing representative were a pleasure to work with.  However, I was disappointed in the vehicle prep process as the dealership failed to identify an issue with the rear lift-gate.  This issue will require a visit to the vehicle manufacturer dealership to have corrected and is something that should be have been taken care of by Porsche of Birmingham.

name: Matt Hocutt
text: Great group of people here that will make your buying experience one to remember. Michael was a great asset in helping us purchase our car. No pressure and there for the buyer! Give them a shot, you will enjoy your next car buying experience.

name: Enrique Garcia
text: I recently purchased a used car from this dealership. I had some help from Michael Corely. He is definitely one of the coolest guys I've met in a while. He was very professional, helpful, down to earth. I recommend going to Tom Williams Porsche Audi to purchase your next vehicle. They will do what they can to make sure you are taken care of and have a great experience.

name: William Teague
text: We bought our first Audi from Hannah Griffin this past Thursday.  It was a great experience in every way. We test drove both the Audi and a Lexus.  The Lexus salesperson, Robert Cunningham, was as professional and personable as Hannah, and it we ever decide to buy a Lexus, we'll go to Robert.  But the Audi won the day. We got a fair price on our trade, a good price on the Audi, and there was absolutely no pressure.  We'll be back!

name: Matt Scalici
text: The service manager and sales manager at Porsche Birmingham are the best I've ever experienced. My Macan has only needed routine service in its first 40,000 miles, but they have done a superior job of communicating and servicing my needs.

name: Josh Goodwin
text: Great experience and very competitive pricing on parts and labor! Robben, Seth and Tracy made sure that all of my questions were answered and I feel confident that the service performed on our vehicle was thorough and completed by highly trained specialists. They really know these vehicles and that makes a huge difference for me.

name: Barry Walls
text: I purchased my 2015 Audi Q7 CPO from Tom Williams Porsche Audi,and it was the best SUV purchase I have ever had. Steve Huett my salesman was awesome to work with. He made ever thing so easy for me being that I live 210 miles away and all business was done on the phone. I will do business with them again for sure and tell all my family and friends about Steve and Tom Williams Porsche Audi. Thanks for all your help.

name: Eric Nelson
text:
This is the second Macan I have purchased from Porsche Birmingham, and each time the customer service has been outstanding.  Steve Huett is a well informed salesman, and Sam the Manager is very candid and honest when negotiating a price.
I highly recommend them for your future car buying choice.

name: Joshua Argo
text: My experience with their service department was excellent.  The level of service I received exceeded my expectations, and repairs were completed in a timely manner.  I will definitely continue having my car serviced at Porsche of Birmingham.

name: H.Peter Schmidt
text:
Thank you,
friendly and efficient service, very knowledgeable associates who met my expectation as I am used too.
No surprises exactly what I was told as far as the price and timing is concerned, actually it was two days early.
This is what you expect when owning a Porsche.
Good Job!

name: Pete Morgan
text: Great experience. I am a retired new car dealer with over 40 years owning the businesses. I had never purchased a car that wasn't from my old dealership before, and was pleasantly surprised to find my treatment was just like I expected from my friends and employees at my dealership. Bernard, my salesman was very friendly, professional and knowledgeable. He made every effort to accommodate my purchase decision. The Audi FS 5 was the car I wanted, but due to limited supply in the Southeast it was difficult to find the exact car. Every effort was made by Bernard and Sam, the sales manager, to find what I wanted. After the purchase, Jordan handled the paperwork quickly and was great fun to talk with about the process. This is a well run dealership with a very professional staff. A great place to do business.

name: 8NIN8
text: Salesman MICHAEL WILSON is FANTASTIC!  Before I got to the dealership, he had found a car for me and had the financing lined up; therefore, the transaction was efficient and faster than normal.  Michael was very forthright and honest with me about the kind of car I needed.  He found a low-mileage, very new pre-owned car and worked tirelessly to arrange everything to my benefit.  This is the second car I've bought from Michael.  I intend to return to him whenever I need a new car.

name: Stan Banks
text:
For the last 10 years I have been considering buying a Porsche Cayman.  I currently drive a CLS 500 Benz and I plan to keep that car.  I was looking for more of a weekend car that could become a daily driver if needed and the Cayman fits that plan perfectly.  The car is one item to consider but the company to buy from is just as important of a decision.  I have bought 2 other cars from Porsche of Birmingham when it was know as Tom Williams Porsche/Audi.  I always received first class care and felt like I was treated well with the price on both cars.  Coming back to the same dealer was not a difficult choice.  I had the privilege of conducting a test drive with the Sales Manager, Bart Irvine, and he was open to me putting the care thru the paces.  I drove the car late Friday after work and returned Saturday to make the purchase.  They are very organized and the process was fast and painless.  This is my 3rd purchase from the same location and I think that says it all when considering where you go to buy your first or next Porsche.  Have fun and drive safe!
Stan Banks

name: Philip Royall
text:
Steve Hewitt sold me an upscale Boxster S.  Of the six  comparable  convertible vehicles in this price range I chose the Porsche.  I've never driven anything like it; gorgeous, functional  and solid inside and out.  It is an exemplary and fun driving experience!  It was also a  pleasurable  buying experience.  At least once or twice a week  people ask me questions about it.

Recently I went back and traded in my 718 ☹️ for an upscale 911 😀. Same great sales service and tech service. I really miss my 718 but when I romp ⚡️ down on the 911, there is no comparison

name: David Orienti
text: Was looking for a particular used car and found one at Tom Williams Porsche/Audi. Set up an appointment to see it, drove it, liked it and purchased it.  Steve Huett treated us as  reasonably intelligent human beings, unlike some other car salesmen I've met in the past. As you can tell, I'm not a fan of car salesmen.  Would rather have a root canal done than deal on a car, but I was very happy with the experience at Tom Williams.

name: Harry Buttelwerth
text: I cannot give this dealership high enough marks!!!!! Their immediate honest and complete concern about my purchase, made the entire experience absolute perfection!!!!! My personal dealings with Bart could not have been better. I believe that this will be the first of many purchases from Porsche Birmingham. You should take great pride in setting the bar of customer satisfaction, to a new level, and achieving that goal. My absolute sincere thanks!!!! Harry Buttelwerth

name: Diane Derzis
text:
Tracey is fabulous. He always takes care of me and the babe quickly, courteously and genuinely cares about the customer.
Absolutely 5 stars

name: christopher rambo
text: Overall a fantastic experience. I bought a car sight unseen and we ran into a few obstacles that were all overcome. I would have preferred to have dealt with the same person throughout the entire process, but it worked out just fine. They even delivered the car to me and picked up my trade.

name: Adolfo Ibarra
text: Clear and honest report on what was needed to be performed as well as any potential risks.  Awesome job getting us back on the road.

name: Donna Cox
text: Very nice experience in purchasing my Porsche Macan at Porsche Birmingham.   Steve Huett, our salesman and all the staff at Porsche Birmingham were very helpful and made the process a pleasure versus a chore.   Highly recommend the vehicle, the dealership, and the salesman!

name: Timothy Johnson
text: Easy and Convenient, the service department is setup very nicely.  Out of the weather drop off and pick up area, service advisors has clear view of your arrival, paper work was ready to start the process and quick payment when completed.  Recommend highly to call a few days early to schedule an appointment to be sure any recalls or parts can pre-order if need.

name: taj101276
text: I purchased a used truck from Chuck Gardner. The whole experience was amazingly easy and I felt like they took excellent care of me in regards to my trade and the financing. I would highly recommend giving them a call and if you see a used vehicle on any of the dealerships give Chuck Gardner a call first.

name: Sandy Willis
text: Excellent service and prompt completion. Always a pleasure doing business with Porsche Birmingham.

name: Nir Menachemi
text: I picked up my Audi this week after it arrived ahead of schedule (2 weeks early!).  The service, especially by Bernard (my sales agent) was superb.  He was extremely knowledgably about the vehicle and demonstrated a genuine passion for what he does.  It was a pleasure interacting with him.  He has promised to help me learn all the “bells and whistles” of my new car-- and I look forward to taking him up on that offer.  Thanks!

name: Adrienne Reed
text: Own a Lexus bought at Tom Williams, a Jaguar and Porsche. Lexus service is always great. My first Porsche service experience and it was great. My service guy Richard is fantastic. Professional knowledgeable and fast service. Highly

name: Tammy Cook
text: I contacted Tom Williams Audi a few months ago inquiring about the new Q3, Hannah Griffin answered all my questions and told me she would call as soon as they arrived to the dealership.  As promised, I received the call from Hannah that the Q3 had arrived and I promptly drove to see her and test drive the vehicle.  She is very knowledgeable about all of the Audi vehicles and other brands as well.  She has an excellent way of dealing with her customers and made the experience comfortable, informative and no pressure!  I decided the purchase a 2015 Q5 instead of the Q3.  She and the staff at Tom Williams Audi made the experience wonderful.  From the time I was greeted at the door by Greg Garrison to the finance experience with Jordan.  We look forward to a long relationship with Tom Williams Audi.  We always like to purchase Audi care, so we know we will be back often to have our Q5 serviced by the professionals at their dealership!  Thank you Hannah and all of the staff at Tom Williams Audi!  We will recommend you to our friends and neighbors!

name: Mike White
text: Great selection and exceptional customer service.  We had a great experience with everyone there, especially Michael Freeman.

name: Robert Mitchell
text: My experience was excellent.  The service writer was courteous, knowledgeable and demonstrated a "be of service" demeanor.  I will certainly utilize their services again and highly recommend others do the same.

name: Chung Hsu
text: Very professional service team. Drop off and pick up time spot on per quote and loaner vehicle was provided exactly as promised.  All service items explained in detail.

name: Joseph Zakhary
text: Tracy was excellent and communicated with me several times throughout the day to keep me updated of progress. Car came back spotless after the service appointment. They had a Cayenne for me to take for the day.

name: Chung Hsu
text: Very professional service team. Drop off and pick up time spot on per quote and loaner vehicle was provided exactly as promised.  All service items explained in detail.

name: Amy Wade
text: Spend July 4th with Bernard @ Tom Williams Audi. What a great guy to deal with! So knowledgeable and helpful about making our first Audi purchase. Everyone there was so courteous & professional. Highly recommend Tom Williams Porsche/Audi for any of your new car needs.

name: Joan Currier
text:
My servicing was a shining example of the best service.  I happened in as a result of being nearby for routine oil change and was out in an hour.  Best service ever!

Joan Corr Currier

name: Clayton Hudson
text: Wow! Tracy in the service department was spot on with top quality service and updating me throughout the process. This dealership is one of the best I have used! I am now a complete Porsche Owner!

name: Joseph Zakhary
text: Tracy was excellent and communicated with me several times throughout the day to keep me updated of progress. Car came back spotless after the service appointment. They had a Cayenne for me to take for the day.

name: taryn legvold
text: Best experience buying a car yet. Super quick and everything went smooth. They are very eager to please ;)

name: Steve Mccluskey
text: very good dealership. we are more than pleased with how they handled our purchase. they went out of their way to help make our purchase work.

name: Konie Bryant Clark
text: Always the best service from Tracy and Robben!!! Very welcoming, friendly, and informative!! My car is serviced well by the mechanics also ...I always leave happy!!

name: Kris Williamson
text: Best customer service! Michael is well knowledgable about the vehicles and very professional. Great first experience with porsche!

name: GT3PDL
text: I love this dealership, Tracy and the team always go out of their way to make sure the customer is taken care of.

name: Lyndsey Hirin
text: 0 stars for the Porsche service department. 5 stars for Porsche/Audi sales department. My dad and I have bought 2 Porsches here and I absolutely loved it - I have a lot of appreciation for the sales department here. They are respectful, professional and very knowledgeable. However, I honestly get the WORST service from Richard, the service department employee. If I am going to spend minimum $500 - $1000 for service/repairs, I expect at least a little bit of respect or a decent customer service. He always has a belittling tone and most disrespectful way of treating me. I don't know if he thinks it's okay to treat me this way because I'm a minority or because I look younger than other customers. I didn't say anything when he forgot that I needed a ride back to work for 30 minutes. I didn't say anything when he forgot to call me when my car was ready. But, when I was trying to figure out a time for a driver to pick me up, Richard nearly yelled at me with the most disrespectful voice saying they cannot give me a ride because they are too busy and the drivers will get overtime. Then I asked him what the total will be and he said he does not know with the most annoyed tone. Was I not supposed to ask what the total was going to be??? Very unprofessional. It's okay if they can't pick me up, then they should've let me know in the morning when they dropped me off. Or at least be polite and professional about it. I really DO NOT recommend the service department for any Porsche customers. I will not be back to purchase another car here.

name: Samuel Corbin
text: Excellent customer service. Lee's attention to detail is extraordinary. Great staff all-around. Finished in an acceptable timeframe.

name: Steve Mccluskey
text: very good dealership. we are more than pleased with how they handled our purchase. they went out of their way to help make our purchase work.

name: taryn legvold
text: Best experience buying a car yet. Super quick and everything went smooth. They are very eager to please ;)

name: Brenda Brock

text: Just bought my second car from Mark Colvin.  He and the entire staff from the top manager, sales associates, finance, and service reps are quite simply the best. Mark has been and is always professional courteous, and friendly.  Extremely easy to deal with.  If you are in the market for an Audi or a Porsche, and your comparing these cars with other dealerships or similar.  Go Tom Williams Porsche.  Service before and after sale can not be beat. name: James krouse
text:
Tom Williams Porsche Audi, Mini Cooper is the most arrogant, rude and ignorant people I have ever done business with in 41 years. Their internet sales is horrible. I tried to purchase a 2003 Mini Cooper from them and they were all over me until the financing didn't go through and I am not sure if that was the problem because once the application went in I heard NOTHING back from them.

I sent 3 emails to Benjamin Noe asking what the results were and if we could come and test drive the car and still heard nothing. I even offered to pay cash and still heard nothing. Then I got an automated email that the car in my saved folder was no longer in stock. They have others!!!

It just goes to show you that probably because my "Financial Status" did not measure up to the "high standards" of their dealership, I was ignored as some kind of low life, and left to wonder and dropped. Well I feel I have been misjudged. They should at least have had the decency or courtesy to let me know that, An email or a phone call would have been nice and I could have paid cash for the car if they would have at least contacted me. I felt that I should not have to call them. This car  was going to be a Christmas present for my wife.

I came to Tom Williams because I knew I would get a good car as I have other friends that have bought BMW's there in the past (whom I was with), and they were very happy.

I will NEVER come to ANY Tom Williams dealerships again! This is a direct reflection on Benjamin Noe, and the dealership he represents on how they conduct their business.

BY the way, I bought a 2005 Mini for cash that afternoon and it will NEVER go there for servicing either. I am sure Mr. Williams would pleased to know that!

text: Absolutely wonderful service from Mr. Robben Tindle and his technicians. I had to tow my Porsche to Birmingham and upon arrival, he scheduled my service in the middle of the day. After living in the north and being new to the area, his personal touch made me and my wife feel welcomed and treated us with dignity and respect. The icing on the cake was knowing that the dealership does an incredible job hiring veterans of the armed services. As retired Army officer, it was great to talk and share experiences with another veteran. I look forward to my next visit. They were not able to clean my car due to the lateness of the hour, but I was invited to stop by when in the area to get it done. Kudos to Mr. Tindle and his team!!!

text:
I had been looking for a nice luxury SUV for over 5 months.  I had test driven just about everything on the market and nothing was "the one". On a whim, my husband and I visited Tom Williams Porsche so I could test drive the Audi Q5. We were immediately greeted by Mark Colvin who took great care of us and made the test drive one of the most pleasurable I had ever experienced!  As soon as I started the ignition and backed out of the parking lot, I knew I had indeed found "The one", Once I decided on the color and options, Samuel Fuller assisted us with the financial negotiation.  Although we never buy a car on the first day, we took a chance and haven't regretted it.
Both gentlemen made us feel like our business was a priority and we never felt pressure to purchase.  I am so excited to be a part of the Audi family and I look forward to being a repeat customer of Tom Williams Porsche.  I will definitely recommend them to my friends and family!

name: Justin Boyd
text: Disappointed - Had them do an inspection for me before I purchased a 2014 A6 TDI that I was paying cash for. The car passed the inspection with flying colors and so I purchased at the agreed price. After hearing a knock in the passenger front wheel area over the next few days, I took it to my local shop. They were immediately able to confirmed my fear that the strut on that wheel was completely bent and needed to be replaced to the tune of $1495. My new car that I had for 3 days now needed a repair because of something that should have been found. When I called to ask how this would be handled, I was told that I needed to talk to the manager. Two weeks later, I have still not received a call back.

name: Nestor Cruda
text:
This review could really go either way depending on who experienced it. Most people might go 1 star but for the sake of transparency and benefit of the doubt I'm giving them 3 stars. Don't get me wrong I would recommend this dealership to anybody. Please read along and I'll explain why and maybe future clients/customer can learn from my experience.
My sales guy was Bart. And he was excellent. I'll give him 5 stars if I have to rate him alone. Make the story a little shorter, I made an offer to buy their Cayman. Was not accepted nor rejected. After a few days, the listing went down lower than what I offered.
Called them immediately and asked them why it was listed lower than my offer. Was told it was a mistake, which was fine by me. Some may think otherwise. The next day Bart called me telling me that they want to maintain the integrity of the company and wanted to offer my the lower listed price instead of my offer. I was ecstatic. They didn't have to do that. They could've  said, it was a mistake but they'll take my first offer. I salute them for that especially Bart who made it happen.
Now, I sent all my info for financing so I will know what's my APR and I can decide if I'll try my bank here in Florida if I can find a lower rate before I fly to Birmingham to get the car.  Finance manager Katie called me and said my APR was 3.18%. (Btw, my credit score was 821).  I know I heard it right because I made her tell me my monthly payments and wrote it on paper.  I wanted  my monthly payment to be at 550 per month. When I asked what is the payment if I put 13k down payment, it was way lower, around 539 per month, so I asked her what if it's 12k down payment, she said it was 556 per month which is where I wanted to be. Also, I'm sure it was 3.18% because I went and try the autotrader calculator if it's accurate. Put the numbers in including tax and dealers fee and It was very close to what she told me. So I accepted it. She said she's gonna get it ready when I get there. I did not bother going to my bank since I thought 3.18% was about right basing on my research with excellent credit score (821).
I was picked up from the airport by Lee who was a great guy. Very patient, accommodating and just a very nice person. 10 stars for him if you ask me.
Now, the surprise, upon signing of papers. The same finance manager I talked to over the phone told me my APR was 4.18%!!! Surprise!!! I told her how did it happen? She said it's been like that. I insisted and reminded her about our conversation over the phone and she offered to take off some extras to lower the payment. So now I'm paying 562 per month with my 13k down payment without extras instead of 539 per month with extras. I could've have walked out but I flew from Florida to Alabama. Also, I gave her the benefit of the doubt that she may have type a wrong number in her computer while she was on the phone with me. Still, the difference between the two APRs is 23 dollars per month x 72 months = I lost 1,656 dollars for a simple "mistake". I know It's not a lot of money, but very disappointing if you're expecting something different. It could be an honest mistake. I'll let the reader decide.
This is a great company with excellent staffs. I  still recommended them to my friend whom after driving my Cayman want to buy one too. Although,  I advised him to make sure they send him a copy of the APR agreement before flying there so there's no "mistake" or surprises.

name: Melissa Yeager
text: We were certain that we had found the "Perfect SUV" via web with Tom Williams Porsche. We live 2 hours away and wanted to get as much details via phone before deciding to make the drive. While speaking with the sales manager via phone, we were assured that the vehicle was in tip top shape, excellent condition, and had been detailed, minus one small scratch on the passenger side door that they could buff out and the timing belt which hadn't been replaced (as you can tell by now, that this isn't a brand new vehicle, but it was brand new to us and our budget).  With the great phone call and all the details worked out, we were certain that this was "The One!" We set up an appointment and made the 2 hour road trip. We arrived on time and was told that our sales rep wasn't at work yet, so we started working with an alternate, she was pleasant.  Walking over to the vehicle, I noticed right away that this vehicle was NOT in excellent condition by any means, 3 out of the 4 rims were scuffed up pretty bad, and the 1 minor scratch had turned into 3 separate gouges on 3 different locations of the vehicle. We asked if an inspection had been performed and were assured that yes, everything worked. My husband decided to try everything out and we found that the right side blinker wasn't working. By no means was the vehicle detailed or even cleaned, gum was stuck on the side door, a sticky jam substance was on the roof lite and cd's from the previous owner were left in the glove box.  At this point I was deeply disappointed and regretted the 2 hour one way drive but I had my heart set on this particular vehicle. So, I pulled my husband aside and we agreed that if the dealership could fix those things, then we would be willing to move forward. We talked with the sales agent and she said that she completely understood and would go get the manager. During the wait, the original sales rep showed up to work and she then stated they only perform certain things because they strive to be like "Car Max".  At this point, I was just ready to hear what the manager said, hoping for a better outcome. The manager arrived and absolutely refused to budge on any of our requests, and basically told us that this wasn't a brand new vehicle, that they weren't doing anything. He had offered to give us $500 off for the timing belt that needed replaced which was actually a $940 part and said that we could use the money for them to buff out the rims instead but that would be it. Then proceeded to tell us that the blinker wasn't a safety issue and they would not be fixing it, nor fixing any of the gouges that were present, nor would the vehicle be cleaned. After listening to what he had to say, I gave him back the keys and we left. (I was so disappointed in not getting the car, and even more disappointed with the customer service).  Needless to say, Tom Williams Porche must only be into customers who are willing to spend the big bucks!!!

text: We very recently purchased an Audi Q5 from Tom Williams Audi. Our salesperson, Anna Ethridge, was very accommodating and VERY knowledgeable about the vehicles' features.  We weren't sure whether we wanted a 2.0, 3.0, gas burner, or TDI.  After driving 5 vehicles, we settled on the TDI.  Anna was also a very good instructor when she demonstrated using all of the Audi controls, including the Audi Connect.  She took her time, and had me press the controls as she walked me through everything.  This really helped me operate the sound system, NAV and Bluetooth on the drive home!  Very nice ride - we love it!
